deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Musketeer
deck.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

deck.name: Lava Hound
deck.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Tombstone
deck.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.
